## UseI18nOptions type

`useI18n` options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type UseI18nOptions = {
    useScope?: I18nScope;
} & ComposerOptions;
```

## Remarks

`UseI18nOptions` is inherited [ComposerOptions](./vue-i18n.composeroptions.md)<!-- -->, so you can specify these options.
